Interview with Lavertt McGee, born 1890, in Bedford County, Tennessee, describes her rural farm life growing up before the Depression. After she marries and moves to a farm in Moore County, Tennessee, the Depression hits. Larvertt tells how she raised her family on a farm and discusses some of the ways she and her family adapted to the economic hardships brought by the Depression.
